general_requirements.statewide_program_name: Electrical permits required. Local building permits may be required. Minimal solar deployment or insufficient data for detailed requirements.

interconnection.net_metering_details: Net metering available for systems up to 25 kW. Rocky Mountain Power and Black Hills Energy primary utilities.

special_considerations.wind_load_requirements: Very high wind area. Design wind speeds 100-130 mph.

notes: Very low solar adoption. High winds can be a challenge for installations. Limited state-level incentives. Wind energy dominates renewable energy in the state.
